summary:
CEX - One DEX to rule all chains. Trade and earn like royalty with best pricing, cross-chain swaps, and single-sided yields.

 Cross-chain swaps - Move and convert assets across all major chains

 CeFi-grade liquidity - Minimize slippage and maximize profit

 Share 80% of all protocol revenue - Stake WOO and receive rewards in USDC or WOO

 Earn leading APRs - free of impermanent loss

 START EARNING - Trade how you want. Perpetual futures trading with the execution of a CEX and self-custody of a DEX.

 Performance - Unleash your inner trader with a responsive and gas-free experience

 Cross-chain deposits - Painlessly load up collateral from all your favorite EVM networks

 Self-custody - Keep your own keys and avoid trusting a centralized counterparty

 Deep liquidity - Institutional-grade depth and spreads built for swinging with size

 Easy onboarding - No sign up forms - just connect your wallet and start trading

 START TRADING - Access the markets you want, including popular TradFi assets

 WOO connects traders, exchanges, institutions, and DeFi platforms - democratized access to the best-in-class liquidity and trading execution at zero or low cost.
